resources.string: When creating a job vacancy on our platform, companies will be directed to our payment policy page before they can proceed. Payment for job postings is required upfront and be made securely using a credit card.Our pricing structure is based on the duration of the job posting. We offer various packages ranging from a one-time 30-day posting to a 90-day posting. Companies can choose the package that best fits their needs and budget. Our pricing is competitive and reflects the value of our platform in helping companies find qualified candidates quickly and efficiently.
